<a id="AnimatableBody3D"></a>

# AnimatableBody3D

**Inherits:** [StaticBody3D](StaticBody3D.md) **\<** [PhysicsBody3D](PhysicsBody3D.md) **\<** [CollisionObject3D](CollisionObject3D.md) **\<** [Node3D](Node3D.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A 3D physics body that can't be moved by external forces. When moved manually, it affects other bodies in its path.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

An animatable 3D physics body. It can't be moved by external forces or contacts, but can be moved manually by other means such as code, [AnimationMixer](AnimationMixer.md)\\ s (with [AnimationMixer.callback_mode_process](AnimationMixer.md#AnimationMixer_property_callback_mode_process) set to [AnimationMixer.ANIMATION_CALLBACK_MODE_PROCESS_PHYSICS](AnimationMixer.md#AnimationMixer_constant_ANIMATION_CALLBACK_MODE_PROCESS_PHYSICS)), and [RemoteTransform3D](RemoteTransform3D.md).

When **AnimatableBody3D** is moved, its linear and angular velocity are estimated and used to affect other physics bodies in its path. This makes it useful for moving platforms, doors, and other moving objects.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="AnimatableBody3D_property_sync_to_physics"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **sync_to_physics** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#AnimatableBody3D_property_sync_to_physics)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_sync_to_physics**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_sync_to_physics_enabled**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the body's movement will be synchronized to the physics frame. This is useful when animating movement via [AnimationPlayer](AnimationPlayer.md), for example on moving platforms. Do **not** use together with [PhysicsBody3D.move_and_collide()](PhysicsBody3D.md#PhysicsBody3D_method_move_and_collide).
